mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mateboard(mbid, member_mid, title, content, branch_name) VALUES (mateBoard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberMid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{branchName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, mbid, title, modified_at, nickname, payment_amount, branch_name FROM (SELECT mb.mbid, mb.title, mb.modified_at, m.nickname, m.payment_amount, mb.branch_name FROM mateboard mb JOIN member m ON mb.member_mid = m.mid WHERE mb.status = '0' ORDER BY mb.modified_at DESC) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, mbid, title, content, modified_at, nickname, payment_amount FROM (SELECT mb.mbid, mb.title, mb.content, mb.modified_at, m.nickname, m.payment_amount FROM mateboard mb JOIN member m ON mb.member_mid = m.mid WHERE mb.status = '0' AND mb.member_mid = #{paramId} ORDER BY mb.modified_at DESC) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
